sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom';
import bgImage from "../assets/images/1.jpg";
import {
  Box,
  Typography,
  Button,
  Grid,
  Card,
  CardMedia,
  CardContent,
  CardActions,
  Container,
  Paper,
  Chip,
  Stack,
  Divider,
} from '@mui/material';
import PlayArrowIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PlayArrow';
import DownloadIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Download';
import StarIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Star';

function HomePage() {
  // Featured episodes data
  const featuredEpisodes = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: 'Episode 1: Monotone/Colorful',
      description: 'Kousei Arima was a piano prodigy until his mother died when he was eleven years old.',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYThlNWY5ZDgtYTIxNC00ZjdiLWJmNGUtMDFjMDlmZTAzOWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg',
      rating: 4.8,
      duration: '23 min',
      totalEpisodes: 22,
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: 'Episode 2: Friend A',
      description: 'Kaori forces Kousei to be her accompanist for a violin competition, but he refuses.',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5MjExMzQtMzJlZS00NWU3LTg3NDItYTY5YzU4YzYwZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg',
      rating: 4.7,
      duration: '23 min',
      totalEpisodes: 22,
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: 'Episode 3: Inside Spring',
      description: 'Kousei reluctantly agrees to be Kaori\'s accompanist, but his trauma prevents him from hearing the piano.',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzg5MmI0ZDctODg1Ny00ZDgxLWI0MDgtYmNhZmFiYzM2MWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg',
      rating: 4.9,
      duration: '23 min',
      totalEpisodes: 22,
    },
  ];

  // Popular anime data
  const popularAnime = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: 'Attack on Titan',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5MTczNDQtNDFjNi00ZDU5LWFkNzItOTE1NzQzMzdhNzMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTgyNTA4MjM@._V1_.jpg',
      episodes: 75,
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: 'Demon Slayer',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjZjNzI5MDctY2Y4YS00NmM4LTljMmItZTFkOTExNGI3ODRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg',
      episodes: 44,
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: 'Jujutsu Kaisen',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMwMDM4N2EtOTJiYy00OTQ0LThlZDYtYWUwOWFlY2IxZGVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg',
      episodes: 24,
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      title: 'My Hero Academia',
      image: 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZmYjdjN2UtNjAwZi00YmEyLWFhNTEtNjM1OTc5ODg0MGEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA1NjE5MTAz._V1_.jpg',
      episodes: 113,
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Paper
        sx={{
          position: 'relative',
          backgroundColor: 'grey.800',
          color: '#fff',
          mb: 6,
          backgroundSize: 'cover',
          backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat',
          backgroundPosition: 'center',
          backgroundImage: `url(${bgImage})`,
          height: '600px',
          display: 'flex',
          alignItems: 'center',
          justifyContent: 'center',
          borderRadius: 0,
        }}
      >
        {/* Increase the priority of the hero background image */}
        <Box
          sx={{
            position: 'absolute',
            top: 0,
            bottom: 0,
            right: 0,
            left: 0,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,.7)',
            backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.9) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0.3) 100%)',
          }}
        />
        <Container maxWidth="md" sx={{ position: 'relative', textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <Typography 
            component="h1" 
            variant="h2" 
            color="inherit" 
            gutterBottom 
            sx={{ 
              fontWeight: 'bold',
              textShadow: '0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)',
              mb: 3
            }}
          >
            Your Lie in April
          </Typography>
          <Typography 
            variant="h5" 
            color="inherit" 
            paragraph
            sx={{ 
              maxWidth: '700px',
              mx: 'auto',
              mb: 4,
              opacity: 0.9
            }}
          >
            A heartwarming story about music, friendship, and love that will touch your soul
          </Typography>
          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2, justifyContent: 'center' }}>
            <Button
              variant="contained"
              color="primary"
              component={RouterLink}
              to="/episodes"
              size="large"
              startIcon={<PlayArrowIcon />}
              sx={{ 
                mt: 3,
                px: 4,
                py: 1.5,
                borderRadius: 8,
                fontWeight: 'bold',
                boxShadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(25, 118, 210, 0.5)',
              }}
            >
              Watch Episodes
            </Button>
            <Button
              variant="outlined"
              color="inherit"
              component={RouterLink}
              to="/episodes"
              size="large"
              startIcon={<DownloadIcon />}
              sx={{ 
                mt: 3,
                px: 4,
                py: 1.5,
                borderRadius: 8,
                fontWeight: 'bold',
                borderWidth: 2,
                '&:hover': {
                  borderWidth: 2,
                }
              }}
            >
              Download
            </Button>
          </Box>
          <Box sx={{ mt: 4, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', gap: 3 }}>
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
              <StarIcon sx={{ color: '#FFD700', mr: 0.5 }} />
              <Typography variant="body1">9.2/10 Rating</Typography>
            </Box>
            <Divider orientation="vertical" flexItem sx={{ bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.3)' }} />
            <Typography variant="body1">22 Episodes</Typography>
            <Divider orientation="vertical" flexItem sx={{ bgcolor: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.3)' }} />
            <Typography variant="body1">HD Quality</Typography>
          </Box>
        </Container>
      </Paper>

      {/* Featured Episodes Section */}
      <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mb: 8 }}>
        <Box sx={{ 
          display: 'flex', 
          justifyContent: 'space-between', 
          alignItems: 'center', 
          mb: 4 
        }}>
          <Typography 
            variant="h4" 
            component="h2" 
            sx={{ 
              fontWeight: 'bold',
              position: 'relative',
              '&:after': {
                content: '""',
                position: 'absolute',
                bottom: -8,
                left: 0,
                width: 60,
                height: 4,
                backgroundColor: 'primary.main',
                borderRadius: 2,
              }
            }}
          >
            Featured Episodes
          </Typography>
          <Button 
            variant="text" 
            component={RouterLink} 
            to="/episodes"
            sx={{ fontWeight: 'medium' }}
          >
            View All Episodes
          </Button>
        </Box>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          {featuredEpisodes.map((episode) => (
            <Grid item key={episode.id} xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
              <Card
                sx={{
                  height: '100%',
                  display: 'flex',
                  flexDirection: 'column',
                  transition: '0.3s',
                  borderRadius: 3,
                  overflow: 'hidden',
                  boxShadow: '0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
                  '&:hover': {
                    transform: 'translateY(-8px)',
                    boxShadow: '0 12px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)',
                  },
                }}
              >
                <Box sx={{ position: 'relative' }}>
                  <CardMedia
                    component="img"
                    height="220"
                    image={episode.image}
                    alt={episode.title}
                  />
                  <Box sx={{ 
                    position: 'absolute', 
                    top: 10, 
                    right: 10, 
                    bgcolor: 'primary.main', 
                    color: 'white',
                    px: 1,
                    py: 0.5,
                    borderRadius: 1,
                    fontWeight: 'bold'
                  }}>
                    EP {episode.id}
                  </Box>
                  <Box sx={{ 
                    position: 'absolute', 
                    top: 10, 
                    left: 10, 
                    display: 'flex',
                    alignItems: 'center',
                    bgcolor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.7)', 
                    color: 'white',
                    px: 1,
                    py: 0.5,
                    borderRadius: 1,
                  }}>
                    <StarIcon sx={{ color: '#FFD700', fontSize: 16, mr: 0.5 }} />
                    <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                      {episode.rating}
                    </Typography>
                  </Box>
                </Box>
                <CardContent sx={{ flexGrow: 1, p: 3 }}>
                  <Typography gutterBottom variant="h6" component="h3" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
                    {episode.title}
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                    {episode.description}
                  </Typography>
                  <Stack direction="row" spacing={1} sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
                    <Chip label={`${episode.duration}`} size="small" />
                    <Chip label={`Total: ${episode.totalEpisodes} EP`} size="small" color="primary" />
                  </Stack>
                </CardContent>
                <CardActions sx={{ p: 2, pt: 0 }}>
                  <Button
                    size="small"
                    variant="contained"
                    color="primary"
                    component={RouterLink}
                    to={`/episodes/${episode.id}`}
                    startIcon={<PlayArrowIcon />}
                    sx={{ borderRadius: 6, px: 2 }}
                  >
                    Watch
                  </Button>
                  <Button
                    size="small"
                    variant="outlined"
                    color="primary"
                    component={RouterLink}
                    to={`/episodes/${episode.id}`}
                    startIcon={<DownloadIcon />}
                    sx={{ ml: 1, borderRadius: 6, px: 2 }}
                  >
                    Download
                  </Button>
                </CardActions>
              </Card>
            </Grid>
          ))}
        </Grid>
      </Container>

      {/* Popular Anime Section */}
      <Box sx={{ bgcolor: '#f5f5f5', py: 8 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Typography 
            variant="h4" 
            component="h2" 
            gutterBottom 
            sx={{ 
              mb: 4,
              fontWeight: 'bold',
              position: 'relative',
              '&:after': {
                content: '""',
                position: 'absolute',
                bottom: -8,
                left: 0,
                width: 60,
                height: 4,
                backgroundColor: 'primary.main',
                borderRadius: 2,
              }
            }}
          >
            Popular Anime
          </Typography>
          <Grid container spacing={3}>
            {popularAnime.map((anime) => (
              <Grid item key={anime.id} xs={6} sm={3}>
                <Card
                  sx={{
                    height: '100%',
                    display: 'flex',
                    flexDirection: 'column',
                    transition: '0.3s',
                    borderRadius: 3,
                    overflow: 'hidden',
                    boxShadow: '0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)',
                    '&:hover': {
                      transform: 'translateY(-5px)',
                      boxShadow: '0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.12)',
                    },
                  }}
                >
                  <CardMedia
                    component="img"
                    height="180"
                    image={anime.image}
                    alt={anime.title}
                  />
                  <CardContent sx={{ p: 2 }}>
                    <Typography variant="subtitle1" component="h3" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', mb: 1 }}>
                      {anime.title}
                    </Typography>
                    <Chip 
                      label={`${anime.episodes} Episodes`} 
                      size="small" 
                      color="primary" 
                      variant="outlined"
                    />
                  </CardContent>
                </Card>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* About Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 8 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Grid container spacing={6} alignItems="center">
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Typography 
                variant="h4" 
                component="h2" 
                gutterBottom 
                sx={{ 
                  fontWeight: 'bold',
                  position: 'relative',
                  '&:after': {
                    content: '""',
                    position: 'absolute',
                    bottom: -8,
                    left: 0,
                    width: 60,
                    height: 4,
                    backgroundColor: 'primary.main',
                    borderRadius: 2,
                  },
                  mb: 4
                }}
              >
                About Your Lie in April
              </Typography>
              <Typography paragraph sx={{ fontSize: '1.1rem', mb: 3 }}>
                Your Lie in April (四月は君の嘘, Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso) is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Naoshi Arakawa.
              </Typography>
              <Typography paragraph sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
                The story follows Kousei Arima, a piano prodigy who loses his ability to hear the piano after his mother's death. 
                His life changes when he meets Kaori Miyazono, a free-spirited violinist who helps him rediscover his love for music.
              </Typography>
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2, mt: 4 }}>
                <Button
                  variant="contained"
                  color="primary"
                  component={RouterLink}
                  to="/about"
                  sx={{ borderRadius: 6, px: 3 }}
                >
                  Learn More
                </Button>
                <Button
                  variant="outlined"
                  color="primary"
                  component={RouterLink}
                  to="/episodes"
                  sx={{ borderRadius: 6, px: 3 }}
                >
                  Browse Episodes
                </Button>
              </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Box
                component="img"
                src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYThlNWY5ZDgtYTIxNC00ZjdiLWJmNGUtMDFjMDlmZTAzOWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjAwNDUxODI@._V1_.jpg"
                alt="Your Lie in April"
                sx={{
                  width: '100%',
                  borderRadius: 4,
                  boxShadow: '0 20px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)',
                }}
              />
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default HomePage;
